description.displayText: Frances took care of my Mom and was kind, considerate and patient. She helped with light housework and laundry, whatever she needed. She took her to the hairdresser and helped her take care of her dog too! I would highly recommend Frances! She came to our family at a time we needed help and peace of mind our Mom was safe and taken care of.  He is a very hard worker and honest. You would be lucky to have Frances as a care taker.
description.originalText: Frances took care of my Mom and was kind, considerate and patient. She helped with light housework and laundry, whatever she needed. She took her to the hairdresser and helped her take care of her dog too! I would highly recommend Frances! She came to our family at a time we needed help and peace of mind our Mom was safe and taken care of.  He is a very hard worker and honest. You would be lucky to have Frances as a care taker.

description.displayText: Fran was very wonderful and caring with my mother.  She dispense medicine and gave her meals. She also took my mother to her doctor appointments, helped her with dressing and bathing and did light house keeping. My mother loved her and would've very excited to see her  everyday  In addition to taking care of my mother, she also watched my daughter after school and on sick days as I work. After my mother passed away, she also continued to watch my daughter and  also my dog taking her for walks and taking her when we went away on vacation. She worked for me full time for about three years until my daughter became old enough to take care of herself.

description.displayText: Frances provided excellent care to my father and to my child. She was very caring and compassionate, which are two qualities that I personally feel are necessary for any caregiver. She was always on time and always available in emergency situations. I felt very comfortable leaving my daughter in her care. It's a difficult task to search for someone who can really be trusted. Frances went above and beyond the call of duty, so to speak and without having to direct her in any way. I highly recommend her services.

description.displayText: Frances was a lunch and recess aide. She was assigned the most difficult grades because she was very good at maintaining  appropriate behavior with them. This was not always easy as the children could sometimes be difficult. She cares and was dedicated. She would also take any suggestions and try them. I would recommend her for a position.
